text: Chaetopappa bellioides, called the pretty lazy daisy, or manyflower leastdaisy, is a North American species of plants in the sunflower family. It native to northern Mexico (Aguascalientes, Chihuahua, Coahuila, Durango, Nuevo León, San Luis Potosí, Tamaulipas, Zacatecas) and to the Rio Grande Valley in western and southern Texas.Shinners, Lloyd Herbert 1946. Wrightia 1(2): 77-79Flora of North America, Pretty lazy daisy, Chaetopappa bellioides (A. title: Chaetopappa bellioides
